---
Song: kATHOdu poo urasa
Film: anbukku nAn adimai
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n3 S

kATHOdu poo urasa
s srgrg s   sr g

poova vaNdurasa
srgrg s  s r g

unnOdu nAn
s mgr  sr

ennOdu nee
s mgr  sr

pooVa  kA..THA  urasa
srgsrg srg srg  rs s

Stanza 1:
yETHam pOttu eraCHa thaNNi O....dum 
p p    d  d  pp p   d   d  p dp grsrg

yEn adhu yEn adhai thEdum vayalum pAdum 
srg gg   gmp pp    pdnpdn pdn pdn dp p

ArAdhO dhAgam vandhA 
ggmpm  g  g   m  p 

Asa  mOgam vandhA 
gmpm g g   m  p

A..THA..di ALA...gi nALA..CHudhO 
g2 g2mp m  rrg2m g2 s srg2r  r


Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
kOdaikkAnal kuRinji malarin jAdhi 
yAr adhu yAr adhai kEttA theriyum sEdhi 
nAn thAnE sinnap poNNu 
poovum nAnum oNNu 
nAn yAru thEnARu neerAda vA
